                  LCD_Color2Index_M555 PROC
;;;48     */
;;;49     unsigned LCD_Color2Index_M555(LCD_COLOR Color) {
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
000002  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;50       int r,g,b;
;;;51       r = (Color>> (8  - R_BITS)) & R_MASK;
000004  f3c102c4          UBFX     r2,r1,#3,#5
;;;52       g = (Color>> (16 - G_BITS)) & G_MASK;
000008  f3c123c4          UBFX     r3,r1,#11,#5
;;;53       b = (Color>> (24 - B_BITS)) & B_MASK;
00000c  f3c144c4          UBFX     r4,r1,#19,#5
;;;54       return b + (g << B_BITS) + (r << (G_BITS + B_BITS));
000010  eb041043          ADD      r0,r4,r3,LSL #5
000014  eb002082          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSL #10
;;;55     }
000018  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;56     
                          ENDP

                  LCD_Index2Color_M555 PROC
;;;60     */
;;;61     LCD_COLOR LCD_Index2Color_M555(int Index) {
00001a  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
00001c  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;62       unsigned int r,g,b;
;;;63       /* Seperate the color masks */
;;;64       b = Index                                  & B_MASK;
00001e  f001031f          AND      r3,r1,#0x1f
;;;65       g = (Index >> B_BITS)                      & G_MASK;
000022  f3c11244          UBFX     r2,r1,#5,#5
;;;66       r = ((unsigned)Index >> (B_BITS + G_BITS)) & R_MASK;
000026  f3c12484          UBFX     r4,r1,#10,#5
;;;67       /* Convert the color masks */
;;;68       r = r * 255 / R_MASK;
00002a  ebc42004          RSB      r0,r4,r4,LSL #8
00002e  251f              MOVS     r5,#0x1f
000030  fbb0f4f5          UDIV     r4,r0,r5
;;;69       g = g * 255 / G_MASK;
000034  ebc22002          RSB      r0,r2,r2,LSL #8
000038  fbb0f2f5          UDIV     r2,r0,r5
;;;70       b = b * 255 / B_MASK;
00003c  ebc32003          RSB      r0,r3,r3,LSL #8
000040  fbb0f3f5          UDIV     r3,r0,r5
;;;71       return r + (g<<8) + (((U32)b)<<16);
000044  eb042002          ADD      r0,r4,r2,LSL #8
000048  eb004003          ADD      r0,r0,r3,LSL #16
;;;72     }
00004c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;73     
                          ENDP

                  LCD_GetIndexMask_M555 PROC
;;;77     */
;;;78     unsigned LCD_GetIndexMask_M555(void) {

;;;79       return 0x7fff;

000052  4770              BX       lr

                          ENDP
